revised_title: Non-Local Electrodynamics: A New Approach to Quantum Field Theory
tldr: The author proposes a new approach to quantum field theory by introducing non-local electrodynamics. They develop a non-local spinor field quantity and use reciprocal commutation relations to create an -matrix free of convergence difficulties. This new formalism offers a different perspective on densities and observability in small space-time regions, potentially leading to a more accurate understanding of elementary particles.
